A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The action was great as usual\, but the \"risks\" Rian said he was taking with the plot were not refreshing.  Basically erasing the mystery of TFA and making some of the most interesting characters from it basically pointless really left a bad taste in my mouth.  Lots of pointless plot and don't get me started on the space walk scene.  I didn't feel it honored my favorite character in the original trilogy in the slightest and took a very poorly done plot to off that character.  Plot seemed unnecessary and rather pointless for most of it outside of Rey and Kylo.  Driver did a much better job this time and I didn't mind Kylo as much.  Daisy did a great job.  Very very disappointed with the new direction of the franchise.
